articles.title: Trump announces ‘TrumpRx’ site for discounted drugs and deal with Pfizer to lower prices - CNN
articles.description: President Donald Trump announced on Tuesday a multipronged effort aimed at lowering drug costs in the United States, including the creation of a “TrumpRx” direct-to-consumer website where Americans can buy medicine at discounted prices and a sweeping deal wit…

articles.author: Bryan Hoch
articles.title: Warren, Blackburn included on Yankees' Wild Card Series roster - MLB.com
articles.description: NEW YORK -- The Yankees have announced their 26-man roster for the American League Wild Card Series against the Red Sox, opting for 12 pitchers and 14 position players.
articles.content:
NEW YORK -- The Yankees have announced their 26-man roster for the American League Wild Card Series against the Red Sox, opting for 12 pitchers and 14 position players.
